docs.lead_paragraph: HARTFORD CONNECTICUT'S legislators went home last week to start running for re-election, leaving behind a three-month record dominated by their decision to spend mil lions of additional tax dollars without raising taxes.

headline.main: 1978 Assembly: Some Hits And Some Misses; Hits and Misses in Hartford BLUE LAWS RIGHT TURNS ON RED LIGHTS FARMLAND PRESERVATION COASTAL AREA MANAGEMENT BOTTLE BILL AUTO EMISSION TESTS 'PRETTY BABY' PRODUCT-LIABILITY LAW HELP FOR THE RETARDED VICTIMS OF CRIME CIVIC CENTER UNEMPLOYMENT 'PETER REILLY' BILL SCHOOL CONSTRUCTION JUVENILE-JUSTICE REFORM TEACHERS' RESIDENCE GARBAGE DUMPING SCHOOL PROFICIENCY TESTS PRESCRIBED SENTENCING LIQUOR PRICES

docs.snippet: HARTFORD CONNECTICUT'S legislators went home last week to start running for re-election, leaving behind a three-month record dominated by their decision to spend mil  lions of additional tax dollars without raising taxes.

docs.lead_paragraph: A few hours after their house in upstate New York was insulated with urea-formaldehyde foam, the young couple developed headaches and a burning sensation in their eyes.
docs.abstract: Article on health problems experienced by people who have insulated homes with urea-formaldehyde foam; vapors are particularly noticeable in mobile homes; illus (M)
docs.snippet: A few hours after their house in upstate New York was insulated with urea-formaldehyde foam, the young couple developed headaches and a burning sensation in their eyes.
